message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, now I'll try to drive a hard bargain!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
You're getting closer, but I still think I can do better
I'm not budging, you're getting close, but I'm not going to give in yet!
